create.query: INSERT INTO Users (Username, Email, PasswordHash, ProfileImageId) VALUES (':username',':email',':hash',:image);
create.desc: Create user with username, email, password & profile image id. Autofill the rest. NEEDS A CYPHER COUNTERPART.

updateUsername.query: UPDATE Users SET Username = ':username' WHERE UserId = :id;
updateUsername.desc: Updates the user's name by id

updateEmail.query: UPDATE Users SET Email = ':email' WHERE UserId = :id;
updateEmail.desc: Updates the user's email by id

updatePassword.query: UPDATE Users SET PasswordHash = ':password' WHERE UserId = :id;
updatePassword.desc: Updates the user's password by id

updateImage.query: UPDATE Users SET ProfileImageId = ':image' WHERE UserId = :id;
updateImage.desc: Updates the user's image by id

updatePoints.query: UPDATE Users SET SocialPoints = SocialPoints + :social, CareerPoints = CareerPoints + :career, PersonalPoints = PersonalPoints + :personal WHERE UserId = :id AND Deleted != True;
updatePoints.desc: Add the user's points values by id

private.query: UPDATE Users SET PrivateAccount = :private WHERE UserId = :id;
private.desc: Mark/unmark user as private from their id

restrict.query: UPDATE Users SET Restricted = :restrict WHERE UserId = :id;
restrict.desc: Mark/unmark user as restricted from their id

delete.query: UPDATE Users SET Deleted = TRUE, DeletedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE UserId = :id;
delete.desc: Mark user as deleted from their id. NEEDS A CYPHER COUNTERPART.

selectAll.query: SELECT UserId, Username FROM Users WHERE Deleted != True;
selectAll.desc: Select all users in the table

selectSome.query: SELECT UserId, Username, ProfileImageId FROM Users WHERE Username ILIKE '%:name%' AND Deleted != True;
selectSome.desc: Select users based off matching names

select.query: SELECT UserId FROM Users WHERE Username LIKE ':name' AND Deleted != True;
select.desc: Select one user off its username

selectByEmail.query: SELECT UserId FROM Users WHERE Email LIKE ':email' AND Deleted != True;
selectByEmail.desc: Select one user off its email

verifyEmailUnused.query: SELECT Email FROM Users WHERE Email LIKE ':email' AND Deleted != True;

getCredentials.query: SELECT Username, Email, PasswordHash FROM Users WHERE UserId = :id AND Deleted != True;
getCredentials.desc: Get username, email & password from the id

getStatus.query: SELECT PrivateAccount, Restricted, Deleted FROM Users WHERE UserId = :id;
getStatus.desc: Return user's private, restricted and deleted status | WORTHLESS QUERY?

getPoints.query: SELECT CareerPoints, PersonalPoints, SocialPoints FROM Users WHERE UserId = :id AND Deleted != True;
getPoints.desc: Get all types of points for user from their id

getProfileInformation.query: SELECT Username, ProfileImageId, PrivateAccount, CareerPoints, PersonalPoints, SocialPoints FROM Users WHERE UserId = :id AND Deleted != True;
getProfileInformation.desc: Grab all columns needed to display user profile from table (JOIN WITH ISLAND DATA?)

getMiniProfile.query: SELECT Username, ProfileImageId FROM Users WHERE UserId IN (:id) AND Deleted != True;
getMiniProfile.desc: Get username and image id to display a user (not on their profile page)

create.query: INSERT INTO Posts (UserId, NetworkId, TextContent, ImageId, ParentId, PrivatePost) VALUES (:userid,:networkid,':text',:imageid,:parentid,:private); SELECT PostId FROM Posts WHERE UserId = :userid ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 1;
create.desc: Create posts with all post data.

like.query: UPDATE Posts SET Likes = Likes + 1 WHERE PostId = :id AND Deleted != True;
like.desc: Need to keep track of this somehow, specific relation stored in cypher

unlike.query: UPDATE Posts SET Likes = Likes - 1 WHERE PostId = :id AND Deleted != True;
unlike.desc: Need to keep track of this somehow, specific relation stored in cypher

editText.query: UPDATE Posts SET TextContent = ':text' WHERE PostId = :id AND Deleted != True;
editText.desc: Updates the post's text by id.

editImage.query: UPDATE Posts SET ImageId = :imageid WHERE PostId = :id AND Deleted != True;
editImage.desc: Updates the post's image by id.

delete.query: UPDATE Posts SET Deleted = TRUE, DeletedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE PostId = :id;
delete.desc: Mark post as deleted from their id.

getByUser.query: SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE UserId = :id AND ParentId IS NULL AND Deleted != True ORDER BY PostId;
getByUser.desc: Grabs all posts from a user but not replies.

getPostReplies.query: SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE ParentId = :id AND Deleted != True ORDER BY PostId;
getPostReplies.desc: Get all replies to a post.

getByNetwork.query: SELECT PostId, UserId, TextContent, ImageId, Likes, ParentId FROM Posts WHERE NetworkId = :id AND Deleted != True ORDER BY PostId;
getByNetwork.desc: Grabs all posts in a network

select.query: SELECT * FROM Posts WHERE PostId = :id AND Deleted != True;

SEARCHING.desc: Other post grabbing techniques might be necessary???

selectCategory.query: SELECT ResourceId FROM Resources WHERE Category = :category ORDER BY ResourceId;
selectCategory.desc: Get resources that fall into a certain category

selectShape.query: SELECT ResourceId FROM Resources WHERE Shape = :shape ORDER BY ResourceId;

create.query: INSERT INTO Networks (NetworkName, NetworkDescription, PrivateNetwork, ImageId) VALUES (':name',':desc',:private,:image); SELECT NetworkId FROM Networks WHERE NetworkName = ':name';

getName.query: SELECT NetworkName, NetworkDescription, PrivateNetwork, ImageId FROM Networks WHERE NetworkId = ':id' AND Deleted != True;

updateName.query: UPDATE Networks SET NetworkName = ':name' WHERE NetworkId = :id AND Deleted != True;

modifyMemberCount.query: UPDATE Networks SET Members = Members + :count WHERE NetworkId = :id AND Deleted != True;

private.query: UPDATE Networks SET PrivateNetwork = :private WHERE NetworkId = :id AND Deleted != True;

delete.query: UPDATE Networks SET Deleted = TRUE, DeletedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE NetworkId = :id;

selectSome.query: SELECT NetworkId, NetworkName, NetworkDescription, PrivateNetwork, ImageId FROM Networks WHERE NetworkName ILIKE '%:name%' AND Deleted != True;

delete.query: UPDATE Images SET Deleted = TRUE, DeletedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ImageId = :id;

getWholeInventory.query: SELECT InventoryData FROM IslandData WHERE UserId = :userid;

getStock.query: SELECT InventoryData->>'Item:resourceid' AS item FROM IslandData WHERE UserId = :userid;
getStock.desc: Get value for specific resource. DEPRECATED may use later if performance becomes a problem.

setStock.query: UPDATE IslandData SET InventoryData = jsonb_set(InventoryData, '{Item:resourceid}', ':stock') WHERE UserId = :userid;

updatePeople.query: UPDATE IslandData SET NumberOfPeople = NumberOfPeople + :people WHERE UserId = :id;
updatePeople.desc: Updates the number of people encoding by the userid

updateData.query: UPDATE IslandData SET DataPath = ':path' WHERE UserId = :id;
updateData.desc: Updates the islandData encoding by the userid

requestFriend.query: INSERT INTO Requests (SenderId, TargetUserId) VALUES (:senderid, :userid); SELECT RequestId FROM Requests WHERE SenderId = :senderid AND TargetUserId = :userid;
requestFriend.desc: Create a Friend Request w/ all needed values

requestNetwork.query: INSERT INTO Requests (SenderId, TargetNetworkId) VALUES (:senderid, :networkid); SELECT RequestId FROM Requests WHERE SenderId = :senderid AND TargetNetworkId = :networkid;
requestNetwork.desc: Create a Network Join Request w/ all needed values

resolve.query: UPDATE Requests SET Resolved = TRUE, ResolvedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE RequestId = :id AND Deleted != TRUE;
resolve.desc: Mark query as resolved between user and target with request id

delete.query: UPDATE Requests SET Deleted = TRUE, DeletedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE RequestId = :id;

select.desc: Get request details from the request id

selectPendingFriendRequests.query: SELECT * FROM Requests WHERE SenderId = :senderid AND TargetUserId > 0 AND Resolved != True AND Deleted != True;
selectPendingFriendRequests.desc: Get friend requests being waited on by sender user Id

selectPendingNetworkRequests.query: SELECT * FROM Requests WHERE SenderId = :senderid AND TargetNetworkId > 0 AND Resolved != True AND Deleted != True;
selectPendingNetworkRequests.desc: Get network requests being waited on by sender user Id

selectOpenFriendRequests.query: SELECT * FROM Requests WHERE TargetUserID = :userid AND Resolved != True AND Deleted != True;
selectOpenFriendRequests.desc: Get friend requests needing replies by target user id

selectOpenNetworkRequests.query: SELECT * FROM Requests WHERE TargetNetworkId = :networkid AND Resolved != True AND Deleted != True;
selectOpenNetworkRequests.desc: Get network requests needing replies by target user id

create.query: INSERT INTO Projects (UserId, ProjectName, ProjectDescription, SocialPoints, CareerPoints, PersonalPoints, DueDate) VALUES (:userid, ':name', ':desc', :social, :career, :personal, ':duedate'); SELECT ProjectId FROM Projects WHERE UserId = ':userid' AND ProjectName = ':name' ORDER BY ProjectId DESC;
create.desc: Create project with user, name, desc, points and due date

modify.query: UPDATE Projects SET ProjectName = ':name', ProjectDescription = ':desc', SocialPoints = :social, CareerPoints = :career, PersonalPoints = :personal, DueDate = ':duedate' WHERE ProjectId = :id;
modify.desc: Modify project description and points values from id

setUpdateId.query: UPDATE Projects SET UpdateId = :updateid WHERE ProjectId = :projectid;
setUpdateId.desc: Set update id for a project/update

finish.query: UPDATE Projects SET OnTime = :ontime WHERE ProjectId = :id;
finish.desc: Mark down project as on time / not on time | MAKE THE CHECK HERE?

delete.query: UPDATE Projects SET Deleted = TRUE, DeletedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ProjectId = :id;
delete.desc: Delete a project (and apply appropriate consequences if needed)

select.query: SELECT * FROM Projects WHERE ProjectId = :id AND Deleted != True;
select.desc: Get a specific project details by projectId

selectByUser.query: SELECT * FROM Projects WHERE UserId = :id AND Deleted != True AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Projects AS sub WHERE sub.UpdateId = Projects.ProjectId) ORDER BY ProjectId;
selectByUser.desc: Get all projects for a given user (Excluding Updates)

getProjectUpdates.query: WITH RECURSIVE UpdateList AS (SELECT ProjectId, ProjectName, ProjectDescription, UpdateId, CreatedDate FROM Projects WHERE ProjectId = :id UNION ALL SELECT p.ProjectId, p.ProjectName, p.ProjectDescription, p.UpdateId, p.CreatedDate FROM Projects p JOIN UpdateList ul ON p.ProjectId = ul.UpdateId) SELECT ProjectId, ProjectName, ProjectDescription, CreatedDate FROM UpdateList WHERE ProjectId != :id;
getProjectUpdates.desc: Get all projects for a given user

create.query: INSERT INTO Notifications (UserId, TextContent) VALUES (:userid, ':text'); SELECT NotificationId FROM Notifications WHERE UserId = ':userid' AND TextContent = ':text' ORDER BY NotificationId desc;

markAsRead.query: UPDATE Notifications SET Viewed = TRUE WHERE NotificationId = :id;

selectByUser.query: SELECT NotificationId,TextContent,Viewed,CreatedDate FROM Notifications WHERE UserId = :id AND Deleted != TRUE;

delete.query: UPDATE Notifications SET Deleted = TRUE, DeletedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE NotificationId = :id;
